001package org.biopax.paxtools.pattern.miner;
002
003import org.biopax.paxtools.controller.PathAccessor;
004import org.biopax.paxtools.model.BioPAXElement;
005import org.biopax.paxtools.model.level3.*;
006import org.biopax.paxtools.pattern.Match;
007import org.biopax.paxtools.pattern.Pattern;
008import org.biopax.paxtools.pattern.PatternBox;
009
010import java.io.IOException;
011import java.io.OutputStream;
012import java.io.OutputStreamWriter;
013import java.util.HashSet;
014import java.util.List;
015import java.util.Map;
016import java.util.Set;
017
018/**
019 * Miner for the related genes (participant or controller) of interactions.
020 * @author Ozgun Babur
021 */
022public class RelatedGenesOfInteractionsMiner extends MinerAdapter
023{
024        private static final PathAccessor controlAcc = new PathAccessor("Interaction/controlledOf*");
025
026        /**
027         * Constructor that sets name and description.
028         */
029        public RelatedGenesOfInteractionsMiner()
030        {
031                super("related-genes-of-interactions", "This miner finds any related gene that is a " +
032                        "participant or a controller of an Interaction (Conversion or TemplateReaction). " +
033                        "The output lists the ID of the interaction and the related gene symbols in a row.");
034        }
035
036        /**
037         * Constructs the pattern.
038         * @return pattern
039         */
040        public Pattern constructPattern()
041        {
042                return PatternBox.relatedProteinRefOfInter(
043                        Conversion.class,
044                        TemplateReaction.class);
045        }
046
047        /**
048         * Writes the IDs of interaction, then gene symbols of related proteins in a line.
049         * @param matches pattern search result
050         * @param out output stream
051         */
052        public void writeResult(Map<BioPAXElement, List<Match>> matches, OutputStream out)
053                throws IOException
054        {
055                OutputStreamWriter writer = new OutputStreamWriter(out);
056
057                for (BioPAXElement ele : matches.keySet())
058                {
059                        Set<String> syms = new HashSet<String>();
060
061                        for (Match m : matches.get(ele))
062                        {
063                                ProteinReference pr = (ProteinReference) m.get("PR", getPattern());
064
065                                String sym = getGeneSymbol(pr);
066                                if (sym != null) syms.add(sym);
067                        }
068
069                        if (syms.size() > 1)
070                        {
071                                writer.write("\n" + ele.getUri());
072
073                                for (Object o : controlAcc.getValueFromBean(ele))
074                                {
075                                        Control ctrl = (Control) o;
076                                        writer.write(" " + ctrl.getUri());
077                                }
078
079                                for (String sym : syms)
080                                {
081                                        writer.write("\t" + sym);
082                                }
083                        }
084                }
085                writer.flush();
086        }
087
088}
